entry.title: Tempered Glass Screen Protector For iPad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jerry
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 5.99 - 6.99 (8 variants)

Add an extra layer of protection on your screen of to protect it from scratches and cracking. It is 0.2mm thick at 9H Durability with a 2.5D curve to fit perfectly.

They have an oleophobic coating to make them oil-resistant and prevent fingerprints to ensure perfect image clarity and touch sensitivity.

The 0.2mm thickness and flexibility makes them very easy to apply.

Part Type Tempered Glass

entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Front Camera
Price: 9.99

Fix a misaligned camera by replacing the plastic frame for the front-facing camera. This part is compatible with an iPad mini with Retina Display. This frame is attached to the back of the front digitizer glass and aligns the front facing camera with the front panel.

This iPad Mini 2 and iPad Mini 3 replacement battery is rated at 6470 mAh (24.3 Wh). It will deliver up to 10 hours of battery life exactly when your iPad Mini 2 and iPad Mini 3 was new.
